DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Time and Jobs over Months
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Last 12 months","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":200,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select v.[Date] as Date,
	sum(v.[Jobs]) as Jobs, sum(v.[Hours]) as Hours
from (
	select datefromparts(Year(dj.[Date]), Month(dj.[Date]), 1) as Date,
			count(dj.[JobType]) as Jobs,
			0 as Hours
	from [Analytics].[Job](@CurrentUserId) dj
	where Year(dj.[Date]) = @year and 
			(dj.[CompanyId] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by datefromparts(Year(dj.[Date]), Month(dj.[Date]), 1)
	union all
	select datefromparts(Year(dt.[Date]), Month(dt.[Date]), 1) as Date, 
			count(dt.[JobType]) as Jobs,
			sum(dt.[ActualTime]) as Hours
	from [Analytics].[Timesheet](@CurrentUserId) dt
	where Year(dt.[Date]) = @year and 
			(dt.[CompanyId] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dt.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dt.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by datefromparts(Year(dt.[Date]), Month(dt.[Date]), 1)
) as v
group by v.[Date]"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Company","Division"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Activity Type per Department and Client
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Last 12 months","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":200,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select NullIf(v.[Client], '') as Client, 
		NullIf(v.[Department], '') as Department, 
		NullIf(v.[JobType], '') as Type,
		sum(v.[Jobs]) as Jobs, sum(v.[Hours]) as Hours
from (
	select dj.[JobType], 
			dj.[Department] as Department,
			dj.[Client] as Client,
			count(dj.[JobType]) as Jobs,
			0 as Hours
	from [Analytics].[Job](@CurrentUserId) dj
	where Year(dj.[Date]) = @year and 
			(dj.[CompanyId] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by dj.[JobType], dj.[Department], dj.[Client]
	union all
	select dt.[JobType],
			dt.[Department] as Department,
			dt.[Client] as Client,
			count(dt.[JobType]) as Jobs,
			sum(dt.[ActualTime]) as Hours
	from [Analytics].[Timesheet](@CurrentUserId) dt
	where Year(dt.[Date]) = @year and 
			(dt.[CompanyId] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dt.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dt.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by dt.[JobType], dt.[Department], dt.[Client]
) as v
group by v.[Client], v.[Department], v.[JobType]"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Company","Division"]}}]

Planned","metricFieldValue":"PlannedTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select NullIf(v.[JobType], '') as Type, 
		sum(v.[Jobs]) as Jobs, sum(v.[Hours]) as Hours
from (
	select dj.[JobType], 
			count(dj.[JobType]) as Jobs,
			0 as Hours
	from [Analytics].[Job](@CurrentUserId) dj
	where Year(dj.[Date]) = @year and 
			(dj.[CompanyId] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by dj.[JobType]
	union all
	select dt.[JobType], 
			count(dt.[JobType]) as Jobs,
			sum(dt.[ActualTime]) as Hours
	from [Analytics].[Timesheet](@CurrentUserId) dt
	where Year(dt.[Date]) = @year and 
			(dt.[CompanyId] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dt.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(dt.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by dt.[JobType]
) as v
group by v.[JobType]"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Company","Division"]}}]
